name: The Solar Trade Association
goal: Our mission is to empower the UK solar transformation. We are paving the way for solar to deliver the maximum possible share of UK energy by 2030 by enabling a bigger and better solar industry. We represent both solar heat and power, and have a proven track record of winning breakthroughs for solar PV, solar thermal and battery storage.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Lobbying UK Government on Solar tariffs and regulation.
Lobbied EU Commission against proposals to introduce AD and CV measures on Chinese solar panels
